Posts.EditableText: How can see the full code of the game? Also what language does it use?
Posts.HTML: How can see the full code of the game? Also what language does it use?

Posts.EditableText:
With the desktop version, _Tools - Code view_. You can also open it up with any text editor (I like Notepad++). To do that with the web version, you will need to download it first; note that you cannot then upload it again.

Quest uses XML to store data. The code is in its own language. It is somewhat C-like, though it uses = for equality, rather than ==, for example.
Posts.HTML:
With the desktop version, Tools - Code view. You can also open it up with any text editor (I like Notepad++). To do that with the web version, you will need to download it first; note that you cannot then upload it again.

Quest uses XML to store data. The code is in its own language. It is somewhat C-like, though it uses = for equality, rather than ==, for example.
